评论详情: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. Such a cute shirt on her.

My daughter chose this top for Christmas and I was skeptical because you never know what fabric is going to feel like when you purchase online. I'm a clothing designer of over 20 years, so I do know my fabrics, garment construction and quality.  I expected this top to be cotton, but it's a synthetic poly blend.  What is nice about it is that it has spandex in it, so the hand feel of this fabric is very nice. The print is soft as well. Very nice top, my daughter loves it.
This shirt is exactly how I imagine it on me.
